hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
name1=s2s_model-uat name2=s2s_model-flask-uat version=`date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M"` #version=v2
# build docker image #cd models #mv Dockerfile_model Dockerfile #docker build . -t us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1:$version #docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1:$version us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1 #docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1:$version cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1 #docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1:$version cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1:$version # # #cd ../flask #mv Dockerfile_flask Dockerfile #docker build . -t us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version #docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2 #docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2 #docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version # # ##push image to docker-hub, mi #docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1 #docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1:$version #docker push cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1 #docker push cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name1:$version # # #docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2 #docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version #docker push cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2 #docker push cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version
#dev_noredis docker build . -t us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2 docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2 docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version
docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2 docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version docker push cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2 docker push cnbj-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name2:$version
